text: Agona SDA College of Education is a teacher training college in Accra, Ghana. The College is about 84 km from the capital Accra, Ghana, and has an area of . The SDA College of Education is affiliated with the University of Education, Winneba. == History == The college was established in 1962 by the government in collaboration with the Seventh-day Adventist Church Ghana, and was first run by the Government of Ghana and the SDA Church. The College admitted its first batch of students in 2013 although had not received accreditation from the National Accreditation Board (Ghana). In 2012 the College applied for a name approval and accreditation. The College, on deliberation with the National Accreditation Board (Ghana), was granted a three year institutional authorization which took effect in December 12, 2013. == Courses == * General Programme * Early Childhood Education Studies * Mathematics/Science == References == Category:Colleges of Education in Ghana Category:1962 establishments in Ghana Category:Educational institutions established in 1962
title: Agona SDA College of Education
